block.createnukecannon.nuke_shell.toolti: Unleashes a powerful nuclear blast, devastating the immediate area in an inferno and irradiating the surrounding environment.
"Now, I am become _Death_, the destroyer of worlds."
You knew what it does. Probably.
advancements.canonnukes.nuke_shell.title: Ah shit, here we go again
